feature.label: KNIME Remote Gateway via REST (experimental, don't install)
feature.description: This features contains the client-side libraries for connecting to a KNIME server via the REST gateway API. It mainly enables remote access to jobs on the server, e.g. to be viewed via the KNIME explorer. This feature and the contained plug-ins are the intellectual property of KNIME AG, Zurich, Switzerland. This plug-in is not part of the Open Source KNIME Platform. It is not released under GPL, like most parts of KNIME. It is available at no charge and it can be used without restrictions. It is provided "as is", without any warranty. You may NOT freely copy it, nor modify or distribute it. For details, please refer to the license agreement.
feature.copyright: Copyright by KNIME AG, Zurich, Switzerland
